metadata.title: CVE-2024-42322 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ipvs: properly dereference pe in ip_vs_add_serviceUse pe directly to resolve sparse warning:  net/netfilter/ipvs/ip_vs_ctl.c:1471:27: warning: dereference of noderefexpression

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
